physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#141 City of Denver taken in 1922 from Inspiration Point. Donor: Mr. Sussman. 745 Clermont, Denver''. On front of photograph: ''From Inspiration Point Mt. [illegible] Calif. 7/26/1922.'' On envelope: ''141 City of Denver, 1922.''

mods.abstract: Panoramic view of the city of Denver, Colorado taken from Inspiration Point.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
